segments.text: You didn't ring me last night . You said you would .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry to have made you disappointed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's all right . But why were you so rude to me at lunch .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Was I ? Sorry , I didn't mean to be . I do apologize .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And why are you yarning now ? Are you bored ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Forgive me darling . I'm very tired .
segments.speaker: S2
